website_summaries.verdict: Distinctive look that blends true rustic appeal with a strong, practical seat.
pros: Heavy woods create an authentic rustic feel
Can handle a good amount of weight
cons: Bench can be heavy to move around

website_summaries.verdict: Contemporary rustic brown table that looks much pricier than it is.
pros: Solid and very little assembly required
cons: Color is darker than it appears in images

website_summaries.verdict: A rustic farmhouse table that looks more expensive than it's reasonable price.
pros: Heavy, sturdy build is made to last
Can be purchased in table or bar height
cons: Some buyers had their table crack within a few months

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful, especially for the price. Real wood - none of that cheap stuff that's ruined as soon as you get a small scratch on it. Not very large but totally fine for seating 6 people. Thankfully I also found the matching bench by same seller right here on Amazon. So so happy with this purchase - would absolutely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: AliseinStyle

customer_reviews.title: It was extremely easy to put together and is way sturdier than I ...
customer_reviews.text: I am so impressed with this table. For the price, I was really expecting something cheap and possibly even tacky looking, but I was blown away once I saw it in person! It was extremely easy to put together and is way sturdier than I imagined it would be! We get compliments on the table daily. By far one of my favorite home purchases.
customer_reviews.author: adam burkey

customer_reviews.title: Broken support brackets. Solid table.
customer_reviews.text: Solid table. Giving 3 stars because the underside support brackets were broken on both sides. One has split from the screw and the other is loose from the screw hole being stripped out. If the seller wants to send me new support brackets I will change my review but until then I am only giving three stars. The table itself is very solid and heavy duty. It has that nice rustic look to it which is what we wanted. I added a photo of how the legs are attached as that was something that I wish someone else posted prior to me purchasing this table.
customer_reviews.author: Clifton

customer_reviews.title: Not a very solid table.
customer_reviews.text: The table part itself is made of very thin and brittle wood. when it arrived, i opened the box and found the table had a crack running all the way down the center of the table, the wood was splintering. The wood they used feels similar to the hollow doors that are inside some homes.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cracked tabletop in less than a month
customer_reviews.text: The table is gorgeous, but apparently terrible quality. I have had the table for less than a month and have used it only a handful of times (we didn't have chairs yet) and there is a giant crack in the wood tabletop that runs from one end to the other. I should have known that the price was too good to be true.
customer_reviews.author: Kara Brockett

customer_reviews.title: Love this table (Update: it cracked)
customer_reviews.text: The wood actually has some character and texture to it. Love this table. Easy to put together. Good choice for farm style dining. Update: Less than a year of ownership and the wood that makes up the side of the tabletop has cracked. The table not seen heavy use. Usually just two people sitting for dinner.
customer_reviews.author: R. Hussien

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my fiance and I
customer_reviews.text: We absolutely love this table. Perfect size and look. I was a little worried it would look cheap but it's honestly high-quality and really nice when paired with the bench and/or white mid-century chairs.
customer_reviews.author: Luna

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful sturdy piece.
customer_reviews.text: Very very heavy sturdy piece. Easy to assemble and nice finish. Lots of compliments on this table and the benches that go with it. Fit well in my eat in kitchen in my apartment.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Bass

customer_reviews.title: Cheap
customer_reviews.text: Table is cute. It came damaged in the mail. Few scratches. Seems like it won’t last long as it is easily damaged.
customer_reviews.author: Missy March

customer_reviews.title: Great looking table but came damaged
customer_reviews.text: Great looking table but came damaged. Didn't want to go through the hassle of returning so I just kept it. Very good when matched with the eames chairs.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron Garon

customer_reviews.title: Love it...
customer_reviews.text: This is totally one of my favorites purchase in amazon! I love it! Everyone ask me where is it from... 💕💕💕
customer_reviews.author: Andreamtc

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful table
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful table. I did have a ding or two on the table top similar to another reviewer. Hardly noticable.
customer_reviews.author: C Soup

customer_reviews.title: Durable Table
customer_reviews.text: I usually dont ever write review but this table is amazing. Super heavy and durable for the price
customer_reviews.author: yen nguyen

customer_reviews.title: sturdy piece of furniture
customer_reviews.text: A handsome, sturdy piece of furniture. I love its rustic feel and character, including the holes and imperfections on the table surface. It certainly belongs to my little home! Happy to share these pictures:
customer_reviews.author: Osler B. Ladia

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Love this table! It’s such a nice solid wood. Gives our kitchen a nice cozy rustic touch.
customer_reviews.author: Madds

customer_reviews.title: Great customer service
customer_reviews.text: This is such a cool table and you can’t beat this price for it! Costumer service was great!!
customer_reviews.author: Abbi Kah

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful table but it arrived damaged. I’m so sad about it. I’m only giving it 3 stars because it came damaged otherwise I would give it a 5.
customer_reviews.author: North Smith

customer_reviews.title: Darker than shown, arrived damaged
customer_reviews.text: Arrived damaged - large dent in one of the legs. The table has ugly pits in the top and the color is nothing like the picture. I ordered the lighter color and it’s so much darker than the images online.
customer_reviews.author: KW

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Love it so much! Heavy Solid wood! Looks Expensive for a very affordable price! setting it up was pretty easy.
customer_reviews.author: Don Christopher Udan

customer_reviews.title: Love this table!
customer_reviews.text: Love this table! For the cost, it is a solid, sturdy table made from real wood. Love the color and rustic style.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Really good table
customer_reviews.text: I love this table, the material is good and the color is really pretty.
customer_reviews.author: Rebeca Almeida

customer_reviews.title: Looks great in my dining room and was so easy to ...
customer_reviews.text: Looks great in my dining room and was so easy to put together. Didn't need any help to do it either.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: ... a review for the bench and the table is awesome..
customer_reviews.text: Wrote a review for the bench and the table is awesome...we actually sit here to eat, no phones just east and chat....great table
customer_reviews.author: Vicki Graham

customer_reviews.title: Super disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: Super disappointed...I love the table. But came with a damage in the top and leg. the y only offer me a 15% discount. Seriously : ((
customer_reviews.author: yovanna

customer_reviews.title: Great value for money
customer_reviews.text: Brilliant table. I had fairly low expectations to be honest .. and when the box arrived it was totally messed up. But we carefully took the packaging off and VOILA. Beautiful table. Easy to assemble and perfect for what we need
customer_reviews.author: G. Allen

customer_reviews.title: Hope to have it for a long time to come.
customer_reviews.text: Love it. It was hard for me to find a small enough table for my small dining room. Tables all seem to be so huge now a days. But this fits perfectly. I hope to have it for a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Cara C.
